name: Robots Evolved
summary:
Robots Evolved is a free-to-play think-type browser puzzle game based on the board game Ricochet Robots by Alex Randolph. 
Try your best use the fewest moves possible to get the robot(s) to the goal! 
 
You can play random puzzles, find and play a custom made puzzle, create your own puzzle and even participate in our daily and weekly challenges.
